00022   sc_list.h -- Simple implementation of a doubly linked list.

00024   Original Author: Stan Y. Liao, Synopsys, Inc.

00030 #ifndef SC_LIST_H
00031 #define SC_LIST_H
00032 
00033 #include <sysc/kernel/sc_cmnhdr.h>
00034 
00035 namespace sc_core {
00036 
00037 //Some forward declarations
00038 class sc_plist_elem;
00039 template<class T> class sc_plist_iter; 
00040 
00041 typedef void (*sc_plist_map_fn)( void* data, void* arg );
00042 
00043 class SC_API sc_plist_base {
00044     friend class sc_plist_base_iter;
00045 
00046 public:
00047     sc_plist_base();
00048     ~sc_plist_base();
00049     
00050     typedef sc_plist_elem* handle_t;
00051 
00052     handle_t push_back(void* d);
00053     handle_t push_front(void* d);
00054     void* pop_back();
00055     void* pop_front();
00056     handle_t insert_before(handle_t h, void* d);
00057     handle_t insert_after(handle_t h, void* d);
00058     void* remove(handle_t h);
00059     void* get(handle_t h) const;
00060     void set(handle_t h, void* d);
00061     void mapcar( sc_plist_map_fn f, void* arg );
00062 
00063     void* front() const;
00064     void* back() const;
00065 
00066     void erase_all();
00067     bool empty() const { return (head == 0); }
00068     int size() const;
00069 
00070 private:
00071     handle_t head;
00072     handle_t tail;
00073 };
00074 
00075 
00076 class SC_API sc_plist_base_iter {
00077 public:
00078     typedef sc_plist_elem* handle_t;
00079     
00080     sc_plist_base_iter( sc_plist_base* l, bool from_tail = false );
00081     ~sc_plist_base_iter();
00082 
00083     void reset( sc_plist_base* l, bool from_tail = false );
00084     bool empty() const;
00085     void operator++(int);
00086     void operator--(int);
00087     void* get() const;
00088     void  set(void* d);
00089     void remove();
00090     void remove(int direction);
00091 
00092     void set_handle(handle_t h);
00093     handle_t get_handle() const { return ptr; }
00094     
00095 private:
00096     sc_plist_base* lst;
00097     sc_plist_elem* ptr;
00098 };
00099 
00100 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00101 
00102 template< class T >
00103 class sc_plist : public sc_plist_base {
00104     friend class sc_plist_iter <T>;
00105 
00106 public:
00107     typedef sc_plist_iter<T> iterator;
00108 
00109     sc_plist() { } 
00110     ~sc_plist() { } 
00111 
00112     handle_t push_back(T d)  { return sc_plist_base::push_back((void*)d);  }
00113     handle_t push_front(T d) { return sc_plist_base::push_front((void*)d); }
00114     T pop_back()           { return (T) sc_plist_base::pop_back(); }
00115     T pop_front()          { return (T) sc_plist_base::pop_front(); }
00116     handle_t insert_before(handle_t h, T d) 
00117     {
00118         return sc_plist_base::insert_before(h, (void*) d);
00119     }
00120     handle_t insert_after(handle_t h, T d)
00121     {
00122         return sc_plist_base::insert_after(h, (void*) d);
00123     }
00124     T remove(handle_t h)
00125     {
00126         return (T)sc_plist_base::remove(h);
00127     }
00128     T get(handle_t h) const { return (T)sc_plist_base::get(h); }
00129     void set(handle_t h, T d) { sc_plist_base::set(h, (void*)d); }
00130 
00131     T front() const { return (T)sc_plist_base::front(); }
00132     T back() const { return (T)sc_plist_base::back(); }
00133 };
00134 
00135 template< class T >
00136 class sc_plist_iter : public sc_plist_base_iter {
00137 public:
00138     sc_plist_iter( sc_plist<T>* l, bool from_tail = false )
00139         : sc_plist_base_iter( l, from_tail )
00140     {
00141 
00142     }
00143     sc_plist_iter( sc_plist<T>& l, bool from_tail = false )
00144         : sc_plist_base_iter( &l, from_tail )
00145     {
00146 
00147     }
00148     ~sc_plist_iter()
00149     {
00150 
00151     }
00152 
00153     void reset( sc_plist<T>* l, bool from_tail = false )
00154     {
00155         sc_plist_base_iter::reset( l, from_tail );
00156     }
00157     void reset( sc_plist<T>& l, bool from_tail = false )
00158     {
00159         sc_plist_base_iter::reset( &l, from_tail );
00160     }
00161 
00162     T operator*() const { return (T) sc_plist_base_iter::get(); }
00163     T get() const     { return (T) sc_plist_base_iter::get(); }
00164     void set(T d)     { sc_plist_base_iter::set((void*) d); }
00165 };
